welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sioux Falls, where the charm of the Midwest meets the beauty of the Great Plains. Known for its stunning waterfalls, vibrant arts scene, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.address: 712 S Minnesota Ave, Sioux Falls, SD 57104
